trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Brandon
There were no other sightings in Brandon on or around February 28th 1970
divs: Sighting DetailsI was 5 years old and in my bed when bright lights began shining in the windows i thought it was a car till i saw the door open to the mobile home and it cast shadows on the hallway wall, i was scared and cover up my head, butwhen i peeked out i got curious and walk to my bedroom door and looked down the hall to my parents room and called momma to a small being i saw him in the dark opening my parents bedroom door then he heard me call out and looked at me, his eyes glowed a blood red color,i was scared agian and returned to my bed and hid under the covers.then next thing i saw was the bright lights again then poof!the light was gone and it was dark again! I remember it vividly !!! im 42 years old and i still see the figure in my mind please tell me if the eyes glowing is a trait of th small grys? i have wondered for many years what i saw that night. any information is appreciated!
